title: My menus keep flickering
body:
So i just updated my game and it had made my menus flicker.
It's like my menus are turning themselves on and off over and over.
My screen is fine but it is only affecting the menus like where my abilities are and the item store.
PLEASE HELP!!!{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like this might be an issue with your GPU.

Are your drivers [up to date](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq2)?
